CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Figure 8 shows that the J-V characteristics of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / TiO x / Al devices provide a similar trend to those of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / LiF / Al devices but their PCEs increased mainly due to increased short circuit currents.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| ITO |
| PEDOT : PSS |
| polymer |
| PC71BM |
| TiO x |
| Al |
| LiF |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| ITO |
| PEDOT : PSS |
| polymer |
| PC71BM |
| TiOx |
| Al |

Note: I assumed "TiOx" is an abbreviation for a specific titanium oxide material. If it refers to a different material, please replace "TiOx" with the correct name.
